pkgmetadata.longdescription: Analysis of Doubly-Truncated Data // Likelihood-based inference methods with doubly-truncated data are developed under various models. Nonparametric models are based on Efron and Petrosian (1999) doi:10.1080/01621459.1999.10474187 and Emura, Konno, and Michimae (2015) doi:10.1007/s10985-014-9297-5. Parametric models from the special exponential family (SEF) are based on Hu and Emura (2015) doi:10.1007/s00180-015-0564-z and Emura, Hu and Konno (2017) doi:10.1007/s00362-015-0730-y. The parametric location-scale models are based on Dorre et al. (2020-).
